1)Annual reduction:3*3%,include raw material;If SOP before the middle of this year,annual reduction will be carried out next year after SOP;If SOP after the middle of this year,annual reduction will be carried out the year aferSOP+2.    
 2)Quotation volume is based on1,000,000sets.                                                                                       3)Use three stations 1000T SMG press machine forsamples.  
4)Net weight:3.57kg,only for reference.The final net weight refer to actual weight.

Logistics costs contain only transportation fee from Ying Ming (Fuzhou) plant to Tianjin VW. If the destination is not Tianjin , transportation fee should be modified. In addition, please note that additional logistics costs (costs of goods management, costs of delivery to assembly line, etc.) have not been included in logistics costs yet and should be added in further estimation.
Delivery date can be negotiated once order is awarded to Ying Ming

- Metal content cost is to be adjusted to actual weight as soon as this is available.
- If actual weight turns out to be different from given weight by more than ± 5%, manufacturing costs also is to be adjusted accordingly. 
- Should the casting weight at any time be affected by more than ±5% as a result of a design change the whole piece price will be revised.
- +15% Flexibility could be provided only with working 18 shifts/week
- BS3 prototypes are considered to be produced with serial tooling.

- Metal content cost is to be adjusted to actual weight as soon as this is available.
- If actual weight turns out to be different from given weight by more than ± 5%, manufacturing costs also is to be adjusted accordingly. 
- Should the casting weight at any time be affected by more than ±5% as a result of a design change the whole piece price will be revised.
-Due to the neccessity of final capacity evaluation, the offer shall remain indicative.
- +15% Flexibility could be provided only with working 18 shifts/week
-Prototype production for Model Phase 3 is considered to be done by serial tooling, therefore no additional costs occur.

- 2%*3 productivity is only for VA

- 26/05/15: Logistic costs included, deliveries on complete containers.

- CBD and other cells show partially dummy figures
- Figures for prototypes are dummy figures
- Technical concept is in discussion with VW TE
- Base Price of Aluminum: 11.07 RMB/kg. The difference to the market price must be adjusted over an automatic quarterly MTZ policy. The MTZ material weight will be calculated after successful part development for SOP. 
Affects all imported parts:
In case of fluctuation of the exchange rate of RMB to foreign currencies by more than 5%, MAHLE reserves the right to adapt the price.
- 3 x 3% on A-price
Starting 12 months after SOP. 
Savings are only valid for achieving the enquired amount of parts. In case the customer is responsible for a delay of SOP, the savings are only valid for years after the year of SOP.
- This quotation does not consider any set parts or respective agency fees. MAHLE doesn¿t take over any warranty or quality responsibility of set parts. This quote does not consider any piece price, logistic cost, packaging cost or validation cost for set parts. The quoted price does not consider function test in serial production for the set part. The validation responsibility is not on MAHLE. The responsibility for technical changes of the set part as well as quality complaints is on the sourcing responsible of the set part. For detailed definition of the addressed points, a common set part agreement is required.

Costs of liners are based on the previously information given by VW including trasnport and packaging (3,5€/liner, 3 liners /Engine Block). Any changes will lead to price adaptations. Packaging material costs not included. Die cavity replacement replacement including in part price (1,60€/p). Productivity savings: 1% x 3 years over added value after 2nd full production year. Tool life estimated: 110.000 shots.
LME value applied in quotation = LME Q3 2015 (valid for Jul 15, Aug 15 and Sept 15) + 0,15€/kg = 1,8196€/kg. MTZ in quotation = ((1,8196€/kg) ¿ 1,2€/kg ) * gross weight * 1,04 = 0,6196€/kg * 13,052kg/p * 1,04 = 8,41€/p. Effective part price = A price + MTZ = 81,89 + 8,41 = 90,30€/p.
prototypes not included in quotation.

- Delivery term : EXW Mannheim
 (Address : UTI Deutschland GmbH, Pfingstweidstasse 1, 68199 Mannheim, GERMANY)
- Price is including import Anti-Dumping duty(22.3%) from China to Germany, and if this Anti-Dumping duty is removed we will reduct the price for 22.3% of import duty (CIF price basis) from submitted price.
- Tooling cost is calculated based on 1 year volume
- The base price of "Net Price Reduction" is excluding material cost and import duty

Our proposal is based on production in Arkal partnership location in ORKOIEN NAVARRA, 31160, Spain.
 
* Prices are FCA manufacturing plant in Spain with Returnable packaging supplied by VW. No packaging material is considered in our quote. In case protective packaging is required - we will update our quote accordingly.

* Quotation is based on recent 2D drawings received from VW. Once we will receive the 3D data, we will update our quotation accordingly (Piece price, Tooling, Gauge). Our proposal will be updated according to final part design.

* Part weight - is according to the part weight in the 2D drawing. In case of any change in part weight we will update our piece price accordingly.

* Raw material PP-GF30 price  spec TL 52625-WD04. In case of material spec change - piece price will be updated accordingly.

* Purchased Components: are specified in the CBD files and including logistics and Arkal Handling cost. In case of any other change, quote will update accordingly.

* Tooling: Our quote is currently according to 1 tool of 2+2 cavity , Tooling price including the gauge price.
 
* Tooling payment conditions - 70% at Note 3 (BMG release) and 30% Note 1 (PAPP release).

* ED&D, Testing & Validations: Total price is compensated into piece price.

Angebotspreis mit LME jedoch ohne Prämie.
Richtpreisangebot!
Der angebotene Teilepreis ist ein Richtpreis, weil uns noch kein Angebot für das Material vorliegt. Sobald die Angebote eingehen, werden die Preise ggf. angepasst.
Materialgüte ist nicht eindeutig definiert. Daher haben wir uns für eine Coilpassivierung nach TL82433 E entschieden.
Aufgrund fehlender Unterlagen wurde folgende Annahme getroffen: Blindniet von einer Seite.
Kalkulationsbasis ist Stapelware. Prototypenwerkzeuge und -bauteile sind nicht Bestandteil dieses Angebotes. Im Auftragsfall für Serienteile können diese in Abhängigkeit der Terminsituation ggf. nachträglich angeboten werden.
Bewertet wurde das Konzept STA. Das lt. Offerform angefragte Konzept VLB konnte nicht bewertet werden, weil die erforderlichen Unterlagen nicht zur Verfügung standen.

Comments related to B Price:
* Contract period: 7 years
* The activities included in the quotation are: JIT transport to unloading point (1 truck with manual loading/ unloading), Linefeeding by AGV system and Empty containers management.
* The conditions for investments (JIT containers and AGV) are: 5% annual interest rate and 5% management rate. It is calculated over 900000 cars.
* The quotation does not include people in VW Navarra and attention of incidents in the linefeeding with the agv system.
* The quotation does not include the maintenance for AGV and JIT containers .
*  The dimensions of JIT containers are 1,6X1,2X2,1 m wiht capacity of 4 pieces.
*  It has considered one piece per car.
*  It had been considered three shifts of work per day.
* If it is add or remove shifts, the quotation will be reviewed.
* Yearly production: 301.000 cars.
*It has considered 215 days of work per year.
* In the price are not included work on Saturdays/ Bank Holidays/ Sundays or out of sequence or work in August. If it is neccessary, it will be quoted separately.

Assembly prototype parts price is the same as serial stage, but VLK and componets cost will be real for each prototype

Development cost has to be paid separately and is CNY 14 Million for motor. DV and PV test cost to be quoted after fix of test specification. 
1. EOP
    Included depreciation cost of production equipment.
    Changed components to meet average power dissipation.

    note) 
    MR sensor and thermistor are not burned in at sensor supplier.
    We will not be able to perform screening test as requested, we do test control PCB and sensor PCB under low temperature and high temperature.

The project schedule has to be discussed separately.

This is the quotation for BorgWarner design of the electric machine, the attached quote letter "BW EEM85 quote custom design BP 22DEC2015 rev1".pdf is binding quote document. 
The Deveopment and Validation cost are included in the quote document.
For the design details please refer to the quote addedndum -" VW370e EEM85  BW Design Proposal 21DEC2015".pdf
Build-to-Print option will be quoted separately, with the target submission date - 20.January 2015

Tool Contribution requested for 1 set of tooling. Tools property: Flexider China. Upon EOP tools to be used for the manufacturing of the original spare parts.
LTC: strictly applicable onto Serial A-Price excluding packing & logistics, starting 12 months after SOP (for SOPs after 01.10.year "0" LTC applicable as of 01.01.Year "2"
Packing: always excluded, assumed to be provided by VW for free.
